ocean.question: I am big and blue, fish like to swim in me. What am I?
I live in the ocean and have a shell. When I get scared, I hide inside! What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 My shell is like my house.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squeeze through small spaces. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I squirt ink when I'm scared.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?
I am a friendly sea animal that can jump out of the water. I like to play. What am I?

hints.text: 🗣️ I can talk to other animals of my kind

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and flippers, and I swim in the ocean. I lay my eggs on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I eat plants in the sea.

ocean.question: I look like a star, but I live under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I am shaped like something you see in the night sky.
🐌 I move very slowly on the ocean floor.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?
I have a pouch to carry my babies and I swim upright in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I'm named after another animal that lives on land
👶 I carry my young in a special pocket.
🌱 I like to eat small plants.

ocean.question: I have pinchers and walk sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I can pinch you with my claws!

plant.question: I am green and grow on a tree. Monkeys like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am yellow when I am ripe.

plant.question: I am a flower and I'm red. People give me to someone they love. What am I?

hints.text: 💌 You give me on Valentine's Day!

plant.question: I am big and tall and I have a trunk. Birds like to live in me. What am I?
I am long and orange and grow in the garden. Bunnies love to eat me! What am I?
I am a big, round fruit that grows on a vine. I'm green on the outside and red on the inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am good to eat when it's hot!

plant.question: I am a big, yellow plant that is tall and we eat my kernels. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can make popcorn with me.

plant.question: I have pointy needles and stay green all year, even in winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 You put presents under me at Christmas.
🌟 You can put a star on top of me.

plant.question: I am a small, round, red fruit that grows on a bush. I'm sweet and good to eat! What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 You can put me on top of a cake.
🍦 I taste great with ice cream.

plant.question: I am a long, green pod with many peas inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 You can eat me cooked or raw.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stem and a big, yellow flower that turns to face the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My flower is very big and bright.
🐥 Birds like to eat my seeds.
